name: Indra
shortLoreBlurb: Indra is a deity from India (Vedic/Hindu) associated with thunder, war, kingship. Often invoked in tales of tempests and sky-sovereignty.
overlapsLinks: Athena (Greek), Durga (Hindu), Indra (Vedic), Karttikeya (Hindu), Perun (Slavic), Sekhmet (Egyptian), Thor (Norse), Tlaloc (Aztec), Zeus (Greek)
description: Indra is a deity from India (Vedic/Hindu) associated with thunder, war, kingship. Often invoked in tales of tempests and sky-sovereignty.
